content: --भित्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {1} the opening in the temples of an elephant from which ichor exudes during rut. {2} ‘a wall-like cheek’, an excellent {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} broad and expansive cheek; निर्धौतदानामलगंडभित्तिः (गजः) <ls>R. 5. 43</ls> (where <ls>Malli.</ls> says प्रशस्तौ गंडौ गंडभित्ती, see {%et seq.%}), <ls n="R.">12. 102.</ls>
